channel.title: Latest Kits dropped by Keyboard Synthesizer
channel.description:
I don’t know about you, but the next Kit, discotropica might be bad. Just saying!
https://app.auxy.co/projects/S3eKvSrEkughurikcVYDwA==
This has a bass line, a polysynth, and 2 synth keys, with a muted guitar.
There are more below! Please tell me about them if you want! :)
